text:
Sequoia Waste Solutions - Pittsburgh, PA | Contract-to-hire | Full-stack web app developers

Sequoia Waste Solutions is a managed service for any business' waste and recycling. We save companies money and reduce the hassle of their trash by finding value in their waste, and offer hand crafted mobile and web apps that help our clients stay ahead of any operational issues. Our goal is to reduce the trash filling our landfills in a way that yields the greatest value for our clients.

Check out the job here: http://sequoiawastesolutions.theresumator.com/apply/APtbxP/W...

Our dev team has typically worked from home, but we do prefer that developers can regularly come to our offices on regular basis as needed.
